data.title: We salute those many donors - Stratford Festival
data.meta_description: We salute those many donors - Stratford Festival
data.text: A Salute to Our Donors Our donors make all the difference! The Stratford Festival is truly appreciative of the gifts received from our generous donors throughout our 60 th season. We salute the over 18,000 individuals, foundations and corporations who believe in the Stratford Festival and are committed to the innovative and engaging theatre presented on our stages each season. The following donor lists recognize gifts made between January 1 and December 31, 2012. Gifts made through the Stratford Festival of America are marked *. Gifts in Support of Designated Projects Support for the 2013 season (commitments received by February 28, 2013). $1M+ Ophelia & Mike Lazaridis $250,000 to $999,999 Richard Rooney & Laura Dinner The S.
